name: part_001
file: tmp_Yozora Mel stream (Dec 19, 2021)【3DLIVE】メルキス3周年LIVE♡Xmas Party【#メルキス３周年ライブ】 [6J010KA__RQ]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Yozora Mel and Yuzuki Choco conclude their opening performance.
MC section where Mel and Choco talk about their outfit swap and prepare for the next song.
Mel and Choco perform a cover of 'Instant Heaven'.

subtitles.original: メリークリスマス！
subtitles.english: Merry Christmas!

subtitles.original: 見てる？見てる？
subtitles.english: Are you watching? Are you watching?

subtitles.original: じゃーん！じゃじゃじゃーん！
subtitles.english: Ta-da! Ta-da-da-da!

subtitles.original: ちょこ先生のさっきのサンタ衣装と...
subtitles.english: Choco-sensei's previous Santa outfit and...

subtitles.original: ...メル様の雪だるま衣装！
subtitles.english: ...Mel-sama's snowman outfit!

subtitles.original: 交換してみました！
subtitles.english: We've swapped them!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！可愛いでしょ？
subtitles.english: Yay! Cute, right?

subtitles.original: どうかな？どうかな？
subtitles.english: How do we look? How do we look?

subtitles.original: めちゃめちゃ可愛くない？この衣装！
subtitles.english: Isn't this outfit super cute?!

subtitles.original: 可愛いよね。
subtitles.english: It's cute, isn't it?

subtitles.original: いっぱい写真撮って...
subtitles.english: Take lots of photos...

subtitles.original: ...いっぱいちょこの感想ツイートしてほしいな。
subtitles.english: ...and I want you to tweet lots of impressions of Choco.

subtitles.original: このハッシュタグで！
subtitles.english: With this hashtag!

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Please do!

subtitles.original: このあともね、いっぱい楽しい曲が続くから...
subtitles.english: Since many more fun songs follow after this...

subtitles.original: ...みんなもいっぱい声出して、お家でねサイリウムとか振って楽しんでね！
subtitles.english: ...everyone raise your voices and enjoy by waving glow sticks at home!

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Please do!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ちょこ先生、早速次の曲行きますか？
subtitles.english: Well, Choco-sensei, shall we move on to the next song?

subtitles.original: いっちゃいますか？
subtitles.english: Shall we do it?

subtitles.original: レッツゴー！
subtitles.english: Let's Go!

subtitles.original: ハッとするような情景が
subtitles.english: A scene that makes my heart skip a beat

subtitles.original: パッと消えそうな心象が
subtitles.english: A mental image that seems to vanish in a flash

subtitles.original: ぼくあたしのファインダーを
subtitles.english: Fills my viewfinder

subtitles.original: 満たしてキレイさ
subtitles.english: And it's beautiful

subtitles.original: どうでもいいけど
subtitles.english: Though it doesn't really matter

subtitles.original: いいね いいね
subtitles.english: Like, like

subtitles.original: バシャリ、キラリ、フワもたり
subtitles.english: Snap, sparkle, fluffy and more

subtitles.original: 背伸び、天使は
subtitles.english: Stretch, the angel is...

subtitles.original: フワフワ自愛して欲が
subtitles.english: Fuzzy self-love and desire...

subtitles.original: 「見せたい！見せたい！」クレッシェンド
subtitles.english: Wanting to show off, wanting to show off, crescendo

subtitles.original: 流行り、つまり、似たり寄ったり
subtitles.english: Trends, in short, more of the same

subtitles.original: 加工したスマイワールド
subtitles.english: The processed world we live in

subtitles.original: 飾らない君を愛した熱も
subtitles.english: Even the heat of loving the unadorned you

subtitles.original: 「いらない！いらない！」クレッシェンド
subtitles.english: Is unnecessary, unnecessary, crescendo

subtitles.original: 味わう前に口に出ちゃう
subtitles.english: Falling from my lips before I can even taste it

subtitles.original: ラブはインスタント
subtitles.english: Love is instant

subtitles.original: 君のハートすら
subtitles.english: Even your heart

subtitles.original: 欲しくなっちゃう今日もバエスタシー
subtitles.english: I start to want, today too, instastasy

subtitles.original: こうやって加工欲加工すればたくさんいいねもらえるのか...
subtitles.english: If I process it coolly like this, can I get lots of likes?

subtitles.original: よし！ちょこも加工！どや！
subtitles.english: Alright! Choco will process it too! How's that?!

subtitles.original: あれ？やりすぎ？
subtitles.english: Huh? Did I overdo it?

subtitles.original: いいね いいね 愛してみても
subtitles.english: Like, like, even if I try to love it

subtitles.original: いいね いいね どうぞお好きに
subtitles.english: Like, like, as you please

subtitles.original: いいね いいね 実はどうでも
subtitles.english: Like, like, it doesn't really matter

subtitles.original: いいね いいね 好きも嫌いも
subtitles.english: Like, like, whether I like or hate it

subtitles.original: 流行ファッションイマイチわからん
subtitles.english: I don't really get current fashion trends

subtitles.original: でもでもちょっと手を伸ばしておしゃれ
subtitles.english: But, but, I'll reach out a bit and be stylish

subtitles.original: あたしにだってできるはずなんだ
subtitles.english: I should be able to do it too

subtitles.original: まずははじめの第一歩
subtitles.english: First, the first step

subtitles.original: 手軽に放送手軽に投稿
subtitles.english: Easy broadcasting, easy posting

subtitles.original: こんなのも出てるエフェクト
subtitles.english: Effects like this are out there too

subtitles.original: かけちゃえ上々したいのヘヴン
subtitles.english: Apply them, feeling high, wanting heaven

subtitles.original: 思い立ったの即登録
subtitles.english: Registered as soon as I thought of it

subtitles.original: タグ付けする友達がいない
subtitles.english: I have no friends to tag

subtitles.original: 位置情報は外せない
subtitles.english: I can't remove the location info

subtitles.original: これがSNSワールドの典例か
subtitles.english: Is this the law of the SNS world?

subtitles.original: 必死にサバイバル&エフォート
subtitles.english: Desperate survival and effort

subtitles.original: あたしはここだよ見てくれ世間
subtitles.english: I'm right here, world, look at me

subtitles.original: 気になったなら押して渡れでsay
subtitles.english: If you're curious, press it and cross over, say

subtitles.original: いいね
subtitles.english: Like

subtitles.original: 舌の音で
subtitles.english: With the sound of the tongue

subtitles.original: 跳ねる衝動だけでいいや
subtitles.english: Just the bouncing impulse is enough

subtitles.original: なんて思うのにさ
subtitles.english: Or so I think, but...

subtitles.original: 入る方向までついつい追っちゃうよ
subtitles.english: I end up following even the direction of entry

subtitles.original: そう！こういう新しいものがいいねを稼げるのか！
subtitles.english: I see! So things like this can earn likes!

subtitles.original: ならメルはこの新作のフラペチーノを投稿！
subtitles.english: Then Mel will post this new Frappuccino!

subtitles.original: あれ？これ中身こぼれてる！あたたた...！
subtitles.english: Huh? The contents are spilling! Ouch ouch ouch...!

subtitles.original: いいね いいね もっとくれたら
subtitles.english: Like, like, if you give me more

subtitles.original: いいな いいな 不純だって
subtitles.english: It'd be nice, even if it's impure

subtitles.original: いいよ インスタント魔法で
subtitles.english: It's okay, with instant magic

subtitles.original: 僕らちょっと繋がれるんだ
subtitles.english: We can connect a little

subtitles.original: どうでもいいから
subtitles.english: Because it doesn't matter
